statements: SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level, drug_target FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE drug_target = true;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id = 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT gene_id, drug_target FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 50 ORDER BY gene_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE drug_target = true
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY expression_level DESC
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_name LIKE 'AB%'
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_name = 'GeneX' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, target_gene FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT sample_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT target_gene, mechanism_of_action FROM drugs WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM gene_expression WHERE sample_type = 'tumor' LIMIT 10;
SELECT drug_name, target_gene FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, target_gene FROM drugs WHERE target_gene = 'ABC';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression WHERE sample_type = 'cancer' ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT count(*) FROM drugs WHERE target_gene IS NOT NULL;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT target_name, target_function FROM drug_targets ORDER BY target_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 5.0;

SELECT gene_name, target_name, target_function FROM gene_expression_data JOIN gene_drug_mapping ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = gene_drug_mapping.gene_id JOIN drug_targets ON gene_drug_mapping.target_id = drug_targets.target_id;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data JOIN gene_drug_mapping ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = gene_drug_mapping.gene_id ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 5;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gene_id;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT gene_name, expression_level, target_name FROM gene_expression_data JOIN gene_drug_mapping ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = gene_drug_mapping.gene_id JOIN drug_targets ON gene_drug_mapping.target_id = drug_targets.target_id;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drug_data WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT target_id, target_type FROM drug_targets ORDER BY target_type DESC;
SELECT gene_id, drug_id FROM gene_drug_relationship WHERE gene_id = 3 AND drug_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drug_data WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';

SELECT gene_name, drug_name, manufacturer FROM gene_expression_data JOIN gene_drug_relationship ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = gene_drug_relationship.gene_id JOIN drug_data ON gene_drug_relationship.drug_id = drug_data.drug_id;
SELECT DISTINCT target_id, target_type FROM drug_targets ORDER BY target_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 0.5
SELECT drug_name, potency FROM drugs ORDER BY potency DESC
SELECT category_name, COUNT(drug_id) AS total_drugs FROM drug_categories INNER JOIN drug_category_mapping ON drug_categories.category_id = drug_category_mapping.category_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT * FROM drug_targets WHERE binding_affinity < 5.0
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 50 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, target_name, potency FROM drugs INNER JOIN drug_targets ON drugs.target_id = drug_targets.target_id WHERE potency > 0.5 ORDER BY target_name ASC;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(drug_id) AS total_drugs FROM drug_categories LEFT JOIN drug_category_mapping ON drug_categories.category_id = drug_category_mapping.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_drugs > 2;

SELECT drug_name, expression_level FROM drugs INNER JOIN drug_targets ON drugs.target_id = drug_targets.target_id INNER JOIN gene_expression_data ON drug_targets.gene_id = gene_expression_data.gene_id;
SELECT target_name, SUM(binding_affinity) AS total_affinity FROM drug_targets GROUP BY target_name HAVING total_affinity > 100 ORDER BY total_affinity DESC;
